Detailed Description

Event dispatcher //!

The Event class manages event posting between objects. To //! post an event, call Event::post(). The event will then be //! dispatched to all EventListener objects that have registered //! themselves via the addListener interface. //! //! An event dispatcher is not always strictly required (direct //! callbacks can usually be used instead) but use of an event //! system improves maintainability, as it decouples event senders //! from receivers, and allows code to be written more //! expressively, in terms of real-world things that have happened.
